channel.title: Homepage on Daniel Han
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Daniel Han

item.description: I am a Senior Research Specialist at the Busara Center for Behavioral Economics, Nairobi, Kenya. Daniel is a Senior Research Specialist at the Busara Center for Behavioral Economics in Nairobi, managing Professor Johannes Haushofer (Stockholm University)’s academic projects in the fields of Behavioural and Development Economics. He has worked with researchers such as Edward Miguel (UC Berkeley), Dennis Egger (Oxford) and Toman Barsbai (Bristol). He was previously a Research Associate at INSEAD, assisting Professors Michael Freeman and Chun So Yeon in the Technology and Operations Management field of research.
Email: daniel.han@busara.global Phone: +254 795746099 Address: 38 Apple Cross Road Busara Center for Behavioral Economics Nairobi, Kenya
Website: I am grateful to Gautam Rao sharing the template for his website, which has been adapted for this website. Please check out his GitHub repository for the template.
